_sText:
-----------------------------------------
EDIT: To see more screenshots/information, go here:
http://www.chez.puffinhost.com/sampleprojects/de_stella.html
-----------------------------------------

Counter-Strike Source Map
de_stella

Terrorist: Seeking revenge on your old high school teachers, you seize Stella Maris Academy and decide to bomb the building. You either must plant the explosives downstairs, in the library (Bombsite A) or plant it at the end of the upstairs hallway (Bombsite B). Beware, the police have already arrived!

Counter-Terrorist: After receiving a report that terrorists have sized Stella Maris Academy, you move into the building. You must prevent the terrorist from bombing the school. Act with extreme prejudice.


by Gonzell
Special Thanks to:
Shankus and others (obtaining blueprints)

Play testers:
Newfie, Destro, Zaralus, Shankus, Scerge, Solid Snake, Finlay12, King Mikey, Violator and others

More Information:
This is actually a map of my old high school. Its not the entire school mainly because of performance reasons (its just too big). If you are wondering if my school really does have tables flipped over in the hallways and bombsite markings the answer is: You're an idiot. Thanks for playing and happy fragging!

Note: This map is still under construction. Although, this version is perfectly playable and is nearing the final release.
